Created an attachment (id=30513)
Crash

and leads to the following crash in testSetExpandedWithCycle....
I have removed the test from the suite. It can be run separately by right-clicking on VirtualLazyTreeViewerTest and choosing "Run as JUnit Plug-in test".

Fixed in HEAD See N20051125-0010.

Bug was that TreeItem.getItem(int) was not checking to see if index was in range.  Added check to Tree.getItem(int) as well and added JUnit tests for this.

Note: In VirtualLazyTreeViewerTest.testSetExpandedWithCycle() it seems like the index of the parent item is being to access a child item (which is of out of range).  An SWT exception is thrown which seems to make the test pass but I think there is something strange going on.
